wikipedia_page.main: John Trollope, 1st Baron Kesteven PC (5 May 1800 – 17 December 1874), known as Sir John Trollope, Bt, between 1820 and 1868, was a British Conservative politician. He served as President of the Poor Law Board in the Earl of Derby's short-lived 1852 Conservative administration.

response: * John Trollope, 1st Baron Kesteven (1800–1874), President of the English Poor Law Board
* John Trollope, 1st Baron Kesteven (1800–1874), former President of the Poor Law Board
